<a id="VisualShaderNodeVectorDistance"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeVectorDistance

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeVectorBase](VisualShaderNodeVectorBase.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Returns the distance between two points. To be used within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Calculates distance from point represented by vector ``p0`` to vector ``p1``.

Translated to ``distance(p0, p1)`` in the shader language.
